mean_en: when somebody edits a film/movie, television programme, etc. they take what has been filmed or recorded and decide which parts to include and in which order
sentence: He is editing the film right now. He'll edit out the unnecessary parts of the film.
sentence_trans: 他正在剪辑电影，其中不必要的部分都会被他剪掉。
word_etyma: e出 + dit给予 → 给出好文章 → 编辑
